sys_ui_action.comments: If a sys_class_name field is present on a list, opening a record of a list (even when clicking the (i) button) will actually open the table stored in the sys_class_name field and sys_id=<selected row sys_id>. The remote tables of the Code Search store the underyling record sys_id and sys_class_name and a click would therefore open the underlying record, but we want to show the JSON data, so we need implement this by opening a popup with a forced sys_id. The other parameters are used to tell the remote table script to load a particular record.
sys_ui_action.name: Show Data
